Package me.mayhem.util.direction

Class UtilVector

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.util.direction.UtilVector
public class UtilVector
extends java.lang.Object
A static utility method for handling getting the distance between two vectors and two entities without modifying the existing positions of either vector or entity (i.e. reduces duplicate code)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UtilVector()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static double getDistanceSquared​(Vector first, Vector second)
    Obtains the distance squared between the two vectors (in pixels squared) Clones the first position as to prevent modifying the position of the first vector when doing the calculations
    static boolean inSight​(Entity entity, Entity other)
    A method to determine if the second entity is in the sight of the first entity (i.e.

  • Constructor Details

    • UtilVector

      public UtilVector()

  • Method Details

    • getDistanceSquared

      public static double getDistanceSquared​(Vector first, Vector second)
      Obtains the distance squared between the two vectors (in pixels squared) Clones the first position as to prevent modifying the position of the first vector when doing the calculations
      Parameters:
      first - The first position
      second - The second position
      Returns:
      The distance squared in pixels squared

    • inSight

      public static boolean inSight​(Entity entity, Entity other)
      A method to determine if the second entity is in the sight of the first entity (i.e. if the first entity is facing the second entity) Clones the entity's positions to prevent moving the entities whilst performing calculations
      Parameters:
      entity - The first entity
      other - The second entity to check if is in sight
      Returns:
      True if the first entity faces the second - false if not
